Reproducable with Dstore-Linux-Processes:
* Connect to remote dstore-linux connection
* Expand "My Processes"
* Rightclick > Monitor
* Enable polling, wait time = 5 seconds
* Wait for 1 poll to occur
* In the Systems view, disconnect the Processes Subsystem
* In the Remote Monitor view, notice that the Refresh action in view's toolbar is still enabled.
* click on Refresh
* you get NPE.
